timeline.bodyText:
We cannot add constraint to package identifier right? it's a little odd that a map of identifier - version constraint is being sent here
Also, no group info being sent right now?
timeline.author: shaguptashaikh

replies.bodyText:
add constraint to package identifier is also an option. Let's proceed with this version for now and hopefully it won't be too many changes to switch to a different way.
Group info should be in job document.
replies.author: hui-yang
